query: add a feature of attaching a file to the email before sending

constraints: Identify the current flow for composing and sending an email
Locate the specific screen where the send action is triggered
Check for existing UI elements related to attachments or media insertion
plan.output_schema: Markdown description of the email composition flow, detailing screen layout and existing action buttons.

matches.flow_goal: To compose a new email, add recipients, and utilize the draft stacking feature to reference other emails simultaneously.

steps.title: Initiate New Email
steps.description: The user starts the process of creating a new email message.
steps.user_action: Click on the 'Compose' button located in the top right header.
steps.system_response: A 'New Message' pop-up window appears in the bottom right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Enter Primary Recipient
steps.description: The user specifies the primary recipient for the email.
steps.user_action: Type the recipient's email address into the 'To' field.
steps.system_response: The email address is accepted and displayed in the field.

steps.title: Add CC Recipient
steps.description: The user adds a secondary recipient to the carbon copy field.
steps.user_action: Click the 'Cc' icon on the right side of the 'To' field, then type the secondary email address.
steps.system_response: A 'Cc' input field expands below the 'To' field and populates with the typed address.

steps.title: Draft Content
steps.description: The user fills in the subject line and the body of the email.
steps.user_action: Type 'New tools' in the Subject field and begin typing the message body.
steps.system_response: Text appears in the respective fields as typed.

steps.title: Stack Draft
steps.description: The user minimizes the current draft to the side to view other content.
steps.user_action: Click the stack/minimize icon in the top right corner of the message window.
steps.system_response: The draft window shrinks and docks into a vertical sidebar on the right side of the screen.

steps.title: Reference Existing Email
steps.description: The user navigates the inbox while the draft remains accessible.
steps.user_action: Click on an existing email thread in the main list.
steps.ui_context: Main inbox view with the draft stacked in the right sidebar.
steps.system_response: The selected email thread opens in the main view area while the draft remains docked on the right.
